change.changenote: Section 7 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 146/2019, effective September 1, 2020.

bcl:section.bcl:text: If a student has not been vaccinated with a scheduled vaccine because of a medical contraindication, a medical health officer may

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: confirm, in writing, that the student will not be vaccinated due to the medical contraindication, or
refuse to confirm the non-vaccination of the student.

change.changenote: Section 8 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 146/2019, effective September 1, 2020.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of taking an action under the Act or the School Act in respect of a communicable disease that is preventable by a scheduled vaccine, a student is deemed not to have been vaccinated with the scheduled vaccine if any of the following circumstances apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a vaccination status report or proof of vaccination with respect to that scheduled vaccine is not provided as required under section 5 [guardian's duty to report];
a vaccination status report is provided as required but

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: does not meet a requirement of section 6 [content of vaccination status report] in respect of that scheduled vaccine, or
is incomplete with respect to, or otherwise fails to address, that scheduled vaccine;

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a medical health officer refuses to confirm the student's non-vaccination with that scheduled vaccine under section 7 (b) [if student not vaccinated].
